text: Avraham Toledano is an Israeli politician. He was the Mashgiach ruchani of the Yeshivat Haraayon Hayehudi, and was number four on the Kach Knesset list in 1988. He was briefly the leader of Kach after Rabbi Meir Kahane was murdered, and before Baruch Marzel took over.John Dart's column of May 04, 1991 in the Los Angeles times. See ==Biography== Rabbi Toledano was born in Morocco, and educated in France. He has a black belt in judo, and lives in the Israeli settlement of Kiryat Arba. == References == Category:Living people Category:Israeli Kahanists Category:Moroccan emigrants to Israel Category:Mashgiach ruchani Category:Israeli Orthodox Jews Category:Religious Zionist Orthodox rabbis Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Kach and Kahane Chai politicians Category:Moroccan Jews Category:Israeli people of Moroccan-Jewish descent Category:Israeli settlers Category:Israeli male judoka Category:People from Kiryat Arba
title: Avraham Toledano
